item.title: Projects
item.description: Previous Axiom Data Science Detect and Classify Grouper Sounds: Detect and classify fish sounds from passive acoustic recordings using CNNs. Bering Sea Drift and Spill Vessel: Estimate oil spill risk to Alaskan shores from gounded vessels. S2S - Sea Ice Guidance: Provide statistcally generated probabilistic sea ice guidance for the three-week to seasonal time scale. Arctic Oil Spill Risk Assessment: Provide estimates of risk to areas used for subsistance gathering from small “operational” oil spills.

item.title: About
item.description: I previously worked at Axiom Data Science as a Computational Science. I’ve also written a dissertation on sediment dynamics, estuarine physics, and the aquatic light environment of the Columbia River estuary, taught intro to computer science for engineering undergrads, taught high school and middle school math as a member of AmeriCorps, fixed arcade video games, tested multimode lasers, and studied history.
